projects.name: This Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio is built with React and TypeScript, using Styled Components for styling. It's structured into small, reusable components and focuses on clean code, accessibility, and a responsive design.

projects.name: Web Accessebility Quiz
projects.description: This project is a web accessibility quiz built with semantic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It focuses on creating an inclusive and user-friendly experience, with full keyboard navigation, screen reader support, ARIA roles, and WCAG-compliant color contrast.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: This project is a responsive weather app built with TypeScript, fetching data from the OpenWeather API. It shows the current weather, temperature, sunrise and sunset times, plus a 4-day forecast, all styled to match a selected design mockup.

projects.name: Recipe Library
projects.description: This project is a dynamic recipe website built with JavaScript, fetching real-time data from the Spoonacular API. It displays recipes in a user-friendly way, handles API limits gracefully, and includes features like filtering, sorting, and local storage caching.

projects.name: Business Site
projects.description: This project is a responsive business website built with HTML and CSS, using both Flexbox and CSS Grid for layout. It features a navigation bar, a dynamic grid of content, and adapts smoothly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
